original_title: Feminist Theory and How It Relates to the Patriarchal Dividend
overview: Esperanza and Cameron, a young lesbian couple, want to go out for a peaceful drink. Esperanza has just returned to their progressive home in Los Angeles after a visit to her not-so-progressive hometown. But a series of events involving some less-than-respectful people leaves us all wondering...can they go anywhere without being propositioned?
title: Feminist Theory and How It Relates to the Patriarchal Dividend
